mapper.insert: insert into Products ( prod_id, prod_name, prod_commonName, prod_pinyin, prod_firstABC, type_id, second_id, third_id, brand_id, shape_id, kind_id, wh_id, prod_discount, prod_certno, prod_taboo, prod_date, prod_keepdate, prod_storage, prod_function, prod_usage, prod_chengfen, prod_bad, prod_chandi, img_id, format_id ) values ( #{prod_id}, #{prod_name}, #{prod_commonName}, #{prod_pinyin}, #{prod_firstABC}, #{type_id}, #{second_id}, #{third_id}, #{brand_id}, #{shape_id}, #{kind_id}, #{wh_id}, #{prod_discount}, #{prod_certno}, #{prod_taboo}, #{prod_date}, #{prod_keepdate}, #{prod_storage}, #{prod_function}, #{prod_usage}, #{prod_chengfen}, #{prod_bad}, #{prod_chandi}, #{img_id}, #{format_id} )
